name: The Nepian Stronghold
description: Our intelligence suggests that the Nepian have established a major stronghold in the valley's eastern regions. They're using it as a staging ground for their invasion of the remaining stable realms. We need to strike at their heart before they can launch their attack. I need you to assault their stronghold and eliminate their leader.
requirements: Narvark wants you to assault the Nepian stronghold and defeat the Nepian Commander
completiontext: Outstanding! The Nepian Commander has been defeated, and their stronghold is in ruins. This is a major victory - we've crippled their ability to launch large-scale attacks. The valley is now truly secure, and we can proceed with our plan to restore the Reality Anchors.
